meanings.definition: A compound formed by the esterification of a single hydroxyl group with a single carboxylic acid group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the monoesters in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Monoesters are commonly used in the production of certain plastics.
meanings.sent3: The monoesters in the solution seemed to be having a party under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The monoesters danced together in perfect harmony, creating a beautiful chemical bond.
meanings.sent5: The unique structure of monoesters makes them stand out in organic chemistry.
